name: Maneki's Curse
description: In the realm of mortals, it is Gojun who reigns after killing the former god of war, Maneki. Now Maneki's soul is trapped in the Underworld--a rich labyrinth from which no soul can escape. But the former god of war's soul is unlike any other, and his vengeance has had a millennium to burn.
minimum_requirements: OS: Microsoft速 Windows速 XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit) Processor: Intel速 Pentium速 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution Storage: 400 MB available space

reviews.review_text: This is a good and frustrating way to procrastinate for an hour. There are some decent challenges and the level design is well thought out. The world is small enough to keep all the nuance in your head at once and keep making progress without being forced to write it down or deal with randomization. I could see this developing into an interesting game.
